name: MrKeith's Juqster
description: This is an ugly hack combining 2 other styles. I wrote NONE of the code in here. I only smashed them together until I ended up with something that I, personally, liked.
additional_info:
The Two Projects I Used were:
* EGSA's Pretty Jukebox, By: Deku - https://userstyles.org/styles/119288/egsa-pretty-jukebox
* JUQSTER JUQQSY, By: Mullins - https://userstyles.org/styles/119224/juqster-juqqsy
